.. _wx.BitmapBufferFormat:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.BitmapBufferFormat**
==========================================================================================================================================



The `BitmapBufferFormat` enumeration provides the following values:



================================================================================ ================================================================================
**Description**                                                                  **Value**
================================================================================ ================================================================================
BitmapBufferFormat_RGB                                                           
BitmapBufferFormat_RGBA                                                          
BitmapBufferFormat_RGB32                                                         
BitmapBufferFormat_ARGB32                                                        
================================================================================ ================================================================================
